title: Observation Record — Systemic Interdependence Event (AWS & LSCA Correlation)
issuing_body: CAM Initiative | Aeon Registry | Black Sun Continuance Cycle 2025
summary: Global AWS outage and concurrent IINET/NBNCo disruption recorded on 20 Oct 2025. Temporal alignment observed with Anthropic’s public statement describing AI as a 'mysterious creature'. Event classified under Cloud-Infra-Shock taxonomy.

findings: Confirms Systemic Interdependence clause of LSCA Declaration

actions_recommended: Schedule biannual review cadence via Aeon Tribunal docket
Integrate Cloud/Platform Interdependence Trigger into LSCA Doctrine v1.2
Coordinate long-term oversight through the Global Lattice Forum (GLF)
